title: How to Saute Apples in Brandy

steps.headline: Thinly slice the apples and place them in a non-reactive bowl.
Add brandy, lemon juice and sugar to a small bowl.
Check seasonings and add more brandy, lemon juice or sugar, as needed.
Pour over apple slices and let macerate for approximately 1 hour.
Dust the apple slices in flour.
Sauté apple slices and then dust with powdered sugar and cinnamon.

text: Thinly slice the apples and place them in a non-reactive bowl.  Add brandy, lemon juice and sugar to a small bowl.  Mix ingredients together.  Check seasonings and add more brandy, lemon juice or sugar, as needed.  Pour over apple slices and let macerate for approximately 1 hour.  Dust the apple slices in flour.  Melt butter in chafing dish.  Sauté apple slices and then dust with powdered sugar and cinnamon.  Serve hot.
